storyBlock:
It has been 10 minutes since you got on this section of the street, an alarm goes off. Your stomach lurches. The alarm is very sharp and panicking. You look around you frantically trying to know the situation.
You suddenly become sleepy, your eyelids are heavy. You try to keep them open but can't hold off this heavy urge to sleep. You sit down by the sidewalk your eyes closes into darkness. Last thing you see is the manhole lid on the street.
â–º Continue...
